AUTHOR_BIO_EN: Benjamin is the director of our Ideation & Prototyping Lab. Before, he took care of Open Data Projects at the Technology Foundation Berlin. He holds an M.A. in Cultural Studies and did his Ph.D. on the early history of e-government in Darmstadt and Harvard. Twitter: @bnjmnsbl
